content.rendered:
Leading every project with the best health & safety protocol

The safety of our team and others in our working environment is at the forefront of every project we take on. When you choose Eden for your fit out project you’re receiving a high-quality service, delivered safely.

Eden is an accredited fit out specialist, Safecontractor approved and a proud supporter of the Considerate Constructors Scheme. You can find details of our full list of accreditations here.

 

When you work with us, you can rest assured that all work is carried out in line with the latest Health & Safety regulations and that our people and yours remain safe.

At Eden, we have an in-house Health & Safety Manager, who ensures we do all we can to complete our work safely, as well as regular independent health and safety inspections each month conducted by an external provider.

Our whole team is educated and qualified to carry out every aspect of their job in full compliance with health and safety regulations. This includes things like working at height and asbestos management. In addition, all our site managers hold gold CSCS cards.

Company policy documents are available upon request.
